import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Footer from './Footer'; import Axios from 'axios'; export default function AddAppointment() { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { Axios.get("http://localhost:3000/api/users/getUsers") .then((response) => { const userList = response.data.response; setUsers(userList) // console.log(items) }) .catch(error => { console.log(error) }) }, []) return (
); }
